scripts.deploy: pnpm build && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://dadpass.com/ --delete && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws cloudfront list-distributions --query "DistributionList.Items[?Aliases.Items[?contains(@, 'dadpass.com')]].Id" --output text) --paths "/*"
scripts.update-stack: aws cloudformation deploy --region us-east-2 --template static_web_cdn_dad_pass_template.yml --stack-name dad-pass-static-web-us-east-2 --parameter-overrides RootDomainName=dadpass.com CertificateArn=arn:aws:acm:us-east-1:778590694111:certificate/56181d39-41a9-43fa-b007-3c5a432427f0 --tags Repo=https://github.com/edbarnes303/dad-pass
